testcase.name: I_Can_Login_Into_The_Tools_Qa_Page_With_An_Existing_User_And_Correct_Password
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin
scenario: I can login into the Tools QA page with an existing user and correct password given I open the Tools QA page ... Status.passed in 13.05s when I complete the user name field with testing user name ... Status.passed in 0.1394s when I complete the password field with testing user password ... Status.passed in 0.06544s when I click the Login button ... Status.passed in 2.159s then I see the "profile" page is displayed ... Status.passed in 0.005128s then I see the user name is displayed in the page ... Status.passed in 0.03021s @scenario.end ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

testcase.name: After_Login_I_Can_See_The_Elements_Menu_And_Click_On_Text_Box_Option
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin
scenario: After login I can see the "Elements" menu and click on "Text Box" option given I open the Tools QA page ... Status.passed in 11.31s when I complete the user name field with testing user name ... Status.passed in 0.07568s when I complete the password field with testing user password ... Status.passed in 0.06316s when I click the Login button ... Status.passed in 3.155s when I expand "Elements" menu ... Status.passed in 0.07937s when I click "Text Box" option ... Status.passed in 0.08015s then I see the "Text Box" page is displayed ... Status.passed in 0.003991s @scenario.end ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
